recipe.title: Frisée-Apple Salad
ingredients: 2 small heads of Belgian endive, cut crosswise into thin strips
2 small Pink Lady or Jazz apples, quartered, cored, cut into matchstick-size strips
3 tablespoons coarsely chopped fresh Italian parsley
instructions: Combine lemon juice, chopped shallots, and grated lemon peel in small bowl. Gradually whisk in oil. Season dressing to taste with salt and pepper. DO AHEAD: Can be made 2 hours ahead. Let stand at room temperature. Rewhisk before using.
Combine frisée, endive, apples, radishes, and parsley in large bowl. Toss salad with dressing and serve.
